page.title: 05FARMING IN DELABOLE
page.content: By Rachel Davey. My dad works on a farm.When he gets up every morning he has a cup of tea.Then he goes out.My mum is out already getting the cows from the field.In the winter they are in the shed already.Then they start milking. After milking my dad takes them to field while my mum comes in and my brother and I have our breakfast.When we are gone they have their breakfast, that is about 10.15.After that my dad washes the shed,while my mum gets on with the house work.Later my dad and my grandad go to Treligga. We have a few fields and sheds there.When he comes back we all have dinner.At about 6 o'clock my dad goes and fetches the cows,then my mum and dad do the milking.It takes about one and a half hours.When he finishes he has his supper.Then they both go to bed.
